languages.text: {n}Слова скверны заполняют сознание подобно гнили вскрытого гнойника. Одобрительный шепот урчит в мозгу, кровь, что льется по лицу, становится слаще меда... Но вместе с тем вас накрывает гнетущее чувство. Будто взгляд пустых глазниц статуи становится в дюжину раз тяжелее, а поток крови хлещет спину и плечи сильнее, чем раньше.{/n}

{n}The words of corruption fill your consciousness like rotting pus from a lanced abscess. A whisper of approval gurgles and purrs inside your brain. The blood streaming down your face becomes sweeter than honey... However, a dismal feeling comes over you as well. As though the gaze of the statue's empty eye sockets has grown a dozen times heavier, and the stream of blood is lashing your back and shoulders harder than before.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слова скверны заполняют сознание подобно гнили вскрытого гнойника. Одобрительный шепот урчит в мозгу, кровь, что льется по лицу, становится слаще меда... Но вместе с тем вас накрывает гнетущее чувство. Будто взгляд пустых глазниц статуи становится в дюжину раз тяжелее, а поток крови хлещет спину и плечи сильнее, чем раньше.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Worte der Verderbnis füllen dein Bewusstsein wie fauliger Eiter aus einem aufgeschnittenen Abszess. Ein Flüstern der Zustimmung gurgelt und schnurrt in deinem Hirn. Das Blut, das dein Gesicht hinabströmt, wird süßer als Honig ... Dich überkommt aber auch ein Gefühl der Verzweiflung. Als sei der Blick der leeren Augenhöhlen der Statue ein Dutzend Mal schwerer geworden und als würde der Blutstrom deinen Rücken und deine Schultern viel fester auspeitschen als zuvor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of corruption fill your consciousness like rotting pus from a lanced abscess. A whisper of approval gurgles and purrs inside your brain. languages.text: {n}Las palabras de corrupción llenan tu consciencia como el pus putrefacto de un absceso reventado. Un susurro de aprobación gorgotea y ronronea en tu cerebro. La sangre que recorre tu cara se vuelve dulce como la miel... pero, al mismo tiempo, una sensación terrible te llena. Es como si la mirada de las cuencas de la estatua se volviera diez veces más pesada y el chorro de sangre fustigara tu espalda y tus hombros con más furia que antes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of corruption fill your consciousness like rotting pus from a lanced abscess. A whisper of approval gurgles and purrs inside your brain. The blood streaming down your face becomes sweeter than honey... However, a dismal feeling comes over you as well. As though the gaze of the statue's empty eye sockets has grown a dozen times heavier, and the stream of blood is lashing your back and shoulders harder than before.{/n}

Es como si la mirada de las cuencas de la estatua se volviera diez veces más pesada y el chorro de sangre fustigara tu espalda y tus hombros con más furia que antes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}堕落の言葉が、腫瘍の腐った膿のようにあなたの意識を満たす。承認の囁きがあなたの頭の中でグルグルと鳴り響く。顔を流れ落ちる血の味が、はちみつよりも甘くなる…しかし、悲壮感はあなたにも襲い掛かってくる。彫像の虚ろな眼窩の視線が何十倍も重くなり、血はあなたの背中や肩を打ち付けているかのように強く流れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of corruption fill your consciousness like rotting pus from a lanced abscess. A whisper of approval gurgles and purrs inside your brain. The blood streaming down your face becomes sweeter than honey... However, a dismal feeling comes over you as well. As though the gaze of the statue's empty eye sockets has grown a dozen times heavier, and the stream of blood is lashing your back and shoulders harder than before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}堕落の言葉が、腫瘍の腐った膿のようにあなたの意識を満たす。承認の囁きがあなたの頭の中でグルグルと鳴り響く。顔を流れ落ちる血の味が、はちみつよりも甘くなる…しかし、悲壮感はあなたにも襲い掛かってくる。彫像の虚ろな眼窩の視線が何十倍も重くなり、血はあなたの背中や肩を打ち付けているかのように強く流れる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}腐化的词句充斥着你的意识，仿佛裂开的脓肿里流出的脓液。赞许的低语声在你的大脑内嗡嗡作响，从你脸上流下的鲜血变得比蜜糖更加甘美……然而随后，某种阴郁的感觉攫住了你，仿佛雕像空洞眼窝的凝视变重了几十倍。鲜血的洪流变得比之前更加汹涌，猛力鞭打着你的后背与肩膀。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of corruption fill your consciousness like rotting pus from a lanced abscess. A whisper of approval gurgles and purrs inside your brain. The blood streaming down your face becomes sweeter than honey... However, a dismal feeling comes over you as well. As though the gaze of the statue's empty eye sockets has grown a dozen times heavier, and the stream of blood is lashing your back and shoulders harder than before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}腐化的词句充斥着你的意识，仿佛裂开的脓肿里流出的脓液。赞许的低语声在你的大脑内嗡嗡作响，从你脸上流下的鲜血变得比蜜糖更加甘美……然而随后，某种阴郁的感觉攫住了你，仿佛雕像空洞眼窝的凝视变重了几十倍。鲜血的洪流变得比之前更加汹涌，猛力鞭打着你的后背与肩膀。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les mots de corruption emplissent votre conscience comme le pus jaunâtre qui s'écoulerait d'un abcès fraîchement percé. Un murmure d'approbation gronde et ronronne dans votre cerveau. Le sang qui ruisselle sur votre visage se fait plus doux que le miel... Et pourtant, un funeste sentiment vous accable, comme si le regard des orbites vides de la statue était devenu dix fois plus pesant, et le flot de sang vous fouette le dos et les épaules plus durement que jamais.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of corruption fill your consciousness like rotting pus from a lanced abscess. A whisper of approval gurgles and purrs inside your brain. The blood streaming down your face becomes sweeter than honey... However, a dismal feeling comes over you as well. As though the gaze of the statue's empty eye sockets has grown a dozen times heavier, and the stream of blood is lashing your back and shoulders harder than before.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yozlaşma sözleri, neşterle kesilmiş bir çıbandan dökülen çürük irin misali zihnini dolduruyor. Onaylandığına dair bir fısıltı, beyninin içinde çağıldayıp mırıldanıyor. Yüzünden akan kan, damağına baldan bile tatlı geliyor... Ancak bir yandan da kasvetli bir hisse kapılıyorsun. Heykelin boş göz yuvalarından yayılan bakışlar, sanki onlarca kat ağırlaşmış; akan kan, sanki sırtını ve omuzlarını hiç olmadığı kadar sert bir şekilde kamçılıyor gibi hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words of corruption fill your consciousness like rotting pus from a lanced abscess. A whisper of approval gurgles and purrs inside your brain. The blood streaming down your face becomes sweeter than honey... However, a dismal feeling comes over you as well. As though the gaze of the statue's empty eye sockets has grown a dozen times heavier, and the stream of blood is lashing your back and shoulders harder than before.{/n}
